data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Fangchenggang.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Fangchenggang, Guangxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Fangchenggang, Guangxi, China that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Fangchenggang to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, please give the church in the county of Fangchenggang prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Pusha people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
the county of Fangchenggang has (about) 5,538 people who know Jesus, 1,179 people who know about him culturally, and 66,283 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Fangchenggang.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the county of Fangchenggang, Guangxi, China has a population of 73,000.

We estimate Fangchenggang has 5,538 people who might know Jesus, 1,179 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 66,283 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 5,538 believers in Fangchenggang and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
